name: La La Land
sinopsis: Sebastian a jazz pianist and Mia, an aspiring actress, fall madly in love.

name: Star Wars V - The Empires Strikes Back
sinopsis: Imperial troops have driven the rebel forces out of their hidden bases and pursue them across the galaxy.

name: Lilo & Stitch
sinopsis: A lonely girl adopts a dog who is actually a mischievous alien hiding from intergalactic hunters.

name: La noche del Demonio
sinopsis: Demons from the past resurface to torment him while, at the same time, Josh begins to have visions of his father.

name: Lord Of The Rings 2
sinopsis: Gollum guides Frodo and Sam to Mordor while Aragorn and his companions defend Rohan from Saruman's bestial army.
